title: I cant join the game
body: When i try to start up league. For some reason it states "PVP.net Patch Kernel has stopped working A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available." Anyone have any idea what the problem might be and what i have to do to fix it?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are often a result of permissions or installation issues. I recommend your next step be working through the solutions on our [Permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to address the most common solutions for this problem.

Let me know if those steps helped you out.
